font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 和蔼的，友善的：characterized by friendly goodwill; amiable
【例】maintain amicable relations
【例】an amicable divorce 和平离婚
【近】friendly, affable, amicable,amiable,genial, easy to get along with
【反】antagonistic, hostile, unfriendly 有敌意的
【记】 am I capable 我是能够友好的
